amendment.description: To provide funding for maritime security, including the Container Security Initiative, improved data for targeted cargo searches, and full background checks and security threat assessments of personnel at our nation's seaports.

action.text: Amendment SA 3061 proposed by Senator McConnell.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3061 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 8. Record Vote Number: 46.
